header.subtitle: Quick start guide
header.title: First Time Visiting?
header.body:
Before interacting with all the portal functionalities, you'll have to ensure you have the correct setup (wallet, testnet, tokens).

 We can help you jump-start the process!

steps.title: Setup MetaMask
steps.subtitle: To interact with the portal, you need to install and create an account with MetaMask
steps.body:
Click on the button to download MetaMask from the official website.

 Once you've set up an account, you are ready to move to the next step.

steps.title: Connect your account to the portal
steps.subtitle: Now that you created an account with MetaMask, you are ready to connect to the portal
steps.body:
After you click on this button a popup from MetaMask will appear.

 To connect to the portal confirm the request inside the popup.

cta.label: Connect Account
cta.successMessage: Your account is now connected to the portal

steps.title: Connect to the Gaia-X testnet
steps.subtitle: To interact with the assets in this portal you need to be connected to the correct network
steps.body:
After you click on this button a popup from MetaMask will appear.

 To connect to the Gaia-x testnet confirm the request inside the popup.

cta.label: Connect to Gaia-X testnet
cta.successMessage: Your account is now connected to the Gaia-X testnet

steps.title: Import custom tokens
steps.subtitle: Before you can claim some tokens you need to import the tokens' contract addresses to MetaMask
steps.body: Click on the button below to import the OCEAN custom token.

steps.title: Get some tokens
steps.subtitle: To publish or consume the assets in the portal you'll need some GX and OCEAN tokens to spend
steps.body: Click on the buttons below to claim your tokens.

steps.title: Good job! You are ready to explore the portal, scroll down to see more.
steps.suggestion:
One last thing: we are never going to ask for your private key,

 remember to never share it with anyone!
